org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer

Class SanityChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.SanityChecker

  • public class SanityChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class checks a RheemPlan for several sanity criteria:
    1. Subplans must only be used as top-level Operator of OperatorAlternative.Alternative
    2. Subplans must contain more than one Operator
